translation.Name: Audio Tape (Mike Crusader #3)
translation.Description:
An audio tape diary.
Inspect To Play Audio Recording

"Random Theory Vol. 3 #216. Between our seventh anomaly being one of -the most- powerful WMDs we have ever created, and our newly acquired bioweapon contract… could it be possible to bring ‘it’ back from the dead to harvest any useful properties? Could I be the one to do that? And, theoretically speaking, could I get a raise? I just wish I knew how to do it. Things would be so much easier. Funny how that works."
